https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/eOTURubg2BkHq8r9tIoX2R0mNjd.jpg Follows Hazel, who goes to spend the holidays in her home town, where a romance begins to bloom with a local contractor who has been helping her father with their family bakery, but some misunderstandings threaten to tear them apart.
